文議長、上皇さまに謝罪の手紙…韓国側「事実ではない」

07 Nov 2019, 11:25

　日韓議員連盟の幹事長を務める自民党の河村建夫・元官房長官は７日、韓国の文喜相（ムンヒサン）国会議長が慰安婦問題を巡る自らの発言を謝罪する手紙を上皇さまに送ったと明らかにした。河村氏は自身が所属する二階派の会合で「おわびしたいということで、上皇さまにも手紙を出しているという話があった」と語った。
　一方、韓国国会報道官室は７日、文氏が上皇さま宛てに謝罪の手紙を送ったとの日本の一部報道について、事実ではないと発表した。文氏は今年２月に上皇さまに元慰安婦への謝罪を求める発言をしていた。

A letter of apology to Chairman Bun and the Emperor ... “Not true” on the Korean side

07 Nov 2019, 11:25

Liberal Democratic Party leader Keno Kawamura and former secretary-general of the Liberal Democratic Party, who is the secretary-general of the Japan-Korea Parliamentary Federation, said the Korean Parliamentary Minister Munhisan sent a letter to the Emperor apologizing for his remarks over the comfort women issue. Revealed. Mr. Kawamura said at a meeting of the second floor to which he belonged, “There was a story that he wanted to apologize and sent a letter to the Emperor”.
Meanwhile, the Korean Parliament spokesman's office announced on the 7th that it was not true about some reports in Japan that Bun sent an apology letter to the Emperor. In February this year, Mr. Wen said that the Emperor requested an apology for a former comfort woman.
